faqs.question: What documentation is required to purchase a resale flat in sector 2
faqs.answer: When buying a resale flat, essential documents include the registered Sale Deed, Mother Deed, Encumbrance Certificate (EC), property tax receipts, and the Occupancy Certificate (OC) or Completion Certificate (CC).
